snippet: Four government ministers and the speaker of the Parliament speaker tendered their resignations on Wednesday amid a revived 2014 scandal over secret recordings.
abstract: Poland's speaker of Parliament and four government ministers resign amid release of secret recordings, on Facebook, that revive 2014 political corruption scandal.
lead_paragraph: Four government ministers and the speaker of the Parliament speaker tendered their resignations on Wednesday amid a revived 2014 scandal over secret recordings.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Poland: Officials Quit Over Scandal
